summary: This document is an email chain from December 2019 regarding the preparation of subpoenas for financial records from USAA and American Express related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The correspondence involves FBI personnel coordinating the legal requests as part of the investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena riders from the FBI are specifically regarding her financial records from USAA and American Express.

events.title: FBI Provides Subpoena Riders for Maxwell
events.description: An FBI Forensic Accountant sends AMEX and USAA subpoena riders regarding Ghislaine Maxwell to colleagues, following a prior conversation.

events.title: Coordination on Maxwell Financial Subpoenas
events.description: Email chain shows FBI personnel coordinating the handling of subpoenas for Ghislaine Maxwell's USAA and American Express records, with some requiring Non-Disclosure Orders (NDOs).

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: The FBI was actively subpoenaing Ghislaine Maxwell's financial records from USAA and American Express in December 2019.
The investigation involved a Forensic Accountant from the FBI's New York Field Office.
The correspondence indicates some of the subpoenas required Non-Disclosure Orders (NDOs), suggesting sensitive financial inquiries.
The document shows procedural coordination between FBI personnel regarding the execution of these legal requests.
